data.title: BeyondTrust
data.meta_description: BeyondTrustâs Privileged Access Management platform protects your organization from unwanted remote access, stolen credentials, and misused privileges
data.text:
In the next few weeks, you will see the BeyondTrust marketing engine hit warp speed. Pure power and energy will drive this unstoppable force showcasing the next generation of BeyondTrust technology. BeyondSaaS is an easy-to-use, self service, cloud-based vulnerability assessment scanning solution that addresses perimeter-based assets currently not addressed due to cost or incomplete vulnerability management deployments. BeyondSaaS uses BeyondTrustâs Retina technology in the cloud, so you get the same market-leading coverage, reporting, and accuracy that you use on your internal network for perimeter assessments and management. A brand new interface, robust scalability, and complete multi-tenant data isolation keeps scan times fast, accurate, and secure. With this new offering, BeyondTrust is proud to introduce some key and unique features for this SaaS technology:

Multi-tenancy baked into the platform, making it more secure than other cloud based assessment solutions

User access utilizes Microsoft Live as the trusted authority to login, execute assessments, view reports, and configure the system

The environment can support multiple identity providers, including cloud synchronized Active Directory for single sign on

The technology is the first system to use HTML 5 with full support for mobile devices including phones, tablets, and Windows 8.1

Supports vulnerability and web application vulnerability assessment

No software or hardware installation required for perimeter based assessments

So, in the next few weeks, look for some noise. Loud thunderous applause and reviews to be exact. BeyondSaaS is the next generation of going Beyond Traditional Security and our beta clients, partners, and analysts have all confirmed that the future is looking fantastic for BeyondTrust. For more information on the availability of BeyondSaaS, please contact us. Our sales team will be happy to talk.

Morey J. Haber, Chief Security Advisor

Morey J. Haber is the Chief Security Advisor at BeyondTrust. As the Chief Security Advisor, Morey is the lead identity and technical evangelist at BeyondTrust. He has more than 25 years of IT industry experience and has authored four books: Privileged Attack Vectors, Asset Attack Vectors, Identity Attack Vectors, and Cloud Attack Vectors. Morey has previously served as BeyondTrustâs Chief Security Officer, Chief Technology, and Vice President of Product Management during his nearly 12-year tenure. In 2020, Morey was elected to the Identity Defined Security Alliance (IDSA) Executive Advisory Board, assisting the corporate community with identity security best practices. He originally joined BeyondTrust in 2012 as a part of the acquisition of eEye Digital Security, where he served as a Product Owner and Solutions Engineer, since 2004. Prior to eEye, he was Beta Development Manager for Computer Associates, Inc. He began his career as Reliability and Maintainability Engineer for a government contractor building flight and training simulators. Morey earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical Engineering from the State University of New York at Stony Brook.
